title: Procurement for paving works of Jaya Container Terminal - V Yard in the Port of Colombo
decision_details: - The Sri Lanka Ports Authority has planned to extend the existing Jaya Container Terminal - IV Quay Wall to accommodate two medium size container vessels and to develop the yard area behind to increase the yard capacity. The balance development work of Jaya Container Terminal - V need to be completed for full functioning of the said Terminal. Accordingly, national competitive bids have been invited for the procurement of paving work of the reclaimed yard area and connecting it to the existing yard. 09 bids have been received for the same. Accordingly, the proposal made by the Minister of Transport, Highways, Ports and Civil Aviation to award the relevant procurement to M/s Maga Engineering (Pvt) Ltd, based on the recommendations of the Bid Evaluation Committee and the High-Level Procurement Committee, was approved by the Cabinet.
